entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
